name: Road Rampage!
description:
This is my first ever game. I know is isn't as good as what you can find from other companies but I've always wanted to make games and now I finally can! I really hope you enjoy playing this game! Be sure to share this with lots of people! Stay tuned as more updates are coming soon!

This game is a very simple road themed 3D game! You need to dodge the obstacles and be able to make it to the end! This is a simple idea with simple graphics so please enjoy my game and share it with others!

CONTROLS:

Moving:

A & D or Left and Right Arrows

Pause:

Escape
